name: Love Song
content: I've never written a love song
That didn't end in tears
It can replace my fears
I need your patience and guidence
And all your love anymore
When thunder rolls through my life
Will you be able to weather the storm
Theres so much i will give you baby
If i only let myself
Theres a swell of emotions and
I feel i must foretell
But whats the point of this album
If it keeps the love always soon
Baby can i trust this
Why do all things end
Again and again and again
So tell me you when you look in my eyes
This is my very first love song
That didn't end in tears
For the rest of my years
I will love you for the rest of my life
